remarks: A lower bound for the norm of a continuous linear Hilbert space operator. Theorem 3.5(ii) of [Beran] p. 99.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: nmcoplb $p |- ( ( T e. LinOp /\ T e. ConOp /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( normh ` ( T ` A ) ) <_ ( ( normop ` T ) x. ( normh ` A ) ) ) $.
